7021.title: Vijay New Year Specials
7021.description: Join the fun and celebrations with Star Vijay team as they welcome the New Year with special skits and exhilarating performances.

1260102494.title: The Files of Young Kindaichi
1260102494.description: Incantations, curses, oddities... Uncover the "humans" who crawl forth from the shadows.

1260113215.title: Aar Ya Paar
1260113215.description: When the modern world's greed destroys his idyllic tribal existence, a valiant archer becomes a deadly assassin to get even.

1260126094.title: Taaza Khabar
1260126094.description: A public toilet caretaker's poverty-stricken life takes a drastic U-turn when he helps an old woman. How long will fate smile upon him?

1260127169.title: First In the Family
1260127169.description: A collection of unique real-life stories of 11 students from grassroots India who beat all odds to become the first in their families to study abroad.

1260127407.title: Reflection of Waves
1260127407.description: As age takes its toll, retired professor Alan struggles with deteriorating mental health. Escalating problems is his wife’s sudden death. What will he do?

1260127410.title: Ladies First
1260127410.description: Suhana is on cloud nine, all set to marry the love of her life. But when an offensive clip from her stand-up act goes viral, it unleashes unexpected conflicts.

1260127411.title: Itoo
1260127411.description: Despite being distracted by his thoughts, a writer tries to pen an article on MeToo. However, an unexpected incident pushes him to make a startling confession.

1260127414.title: Papa Businessman
1260127414.description: Family time does matter! Owing to his busy routines, a successful businessman struggles to spend time with his family. Will he realise what he’s missing on?

1260127418.title: Make Her Happy
1260127418.description: After living together for some time, Nandita and Rahul decide to get married. However, problems arise as Rahul’s old flame Suhana re-enters his life.

1260127431.title: Chaska
1260127431.description: Whether by donning a mask or bossing around with his toy gun, a young boy develops an absurd addiction to scaring people. But a twist of fate turns things awry.
1260127431.crisp: Horror, Some Coarse Language, Frightening Scenes

1260127432.title: Kaise Ho
1260127432.description: After her breakup, Rashi sinks into the abyss of depression and experiences a phase of self-doubt. All she needs is empathy. Is it too hard to get?

1260127433.title: Navyug
1260127433.description: Uncertainties of the pandemic push a theatre artist to his personal extreme, making him quit a great opportunity. Will he give up or fight against his fears?

1260127434.title: Scooter
1260127434.description: Aniket reaches his hometown to sell off his ancestral house. However, a trip down memory lane makes him question his decision.

1260127435.title: Late Night Taxi
1260127435.description: On her way home late at night, a young woman books a taxi, which makes her dredge up some of her worst nightmares. Will she be able to overcome her fears?

1260127467.title: The Case
1260127467.description: Conflicts of modern relationships abound as a lawyer- Renu experiences the dilemma of second marriage. Will she give love another chance?

1260127469.title: Hope
1260127469.description: After his mother disowns him, a young boy experiences the harsh realities of life, spending his childhood in an orphanage. Will hope prevail amid hard times?

1260127806.title: The Best in the World
1260127806.description: To give life to his own unaccomplished dreams, a man forces his son to become a cricketer. Problems arise when it creates a rift in their relationship.

1260127809.title: Ramju
1260127809.description: A dreamy-eyed street kid emerges as the winner in every dire situation. But when he steals a pair of shoes, the experience changes his perspective towards life.

1260127842.title: Teri Meri Doriyaann
1260127842.description: It’s hate at first sight for Sahiba and Angad! But destined to be together, their lives get intertwined by a marriage alliance, and a love-hate story ensues.
